name: LoadingScreenTweaks
description: Hides various elements of your choice from Geometry Dash's loading screen.

hideCocosAndFmod.name: Hide Cocos/FMod Watermarks
hideCocosAndFmod.description: Hides the Cocos Engine and FMod watermarks.

customSplashText.name: Custom Splash Text
customSplashText.description:
Toggles between custom golden splash text and RobTop's splash text.

(Enabling "Hide Splash Text" overrides this.)

custom.name: custom.txt Splash Text
custom.description:
<cp>[REQUIRES RESTART TO APPLY]</c>

Includes your own custom loading screen splash text.
Please edit the "custom.txt" file by opening this mod's config directory (look for the golden pencil button at the bottom left of the mod's introductory screen).

stanleyCeleste.name: Include the Stanley Parable + Celeste
stanleyCeleste.description:
<cp>[REQUIRES RESTART TO APPLY]</c>

Includes quotes from Celeste and The Stanley Parable.

multiline.name: Multiline Splash Text
multiline.description: Custom splash texts can either become multiline splash texts (if this is enabled) or be limited to one line (if this is disabled). Here is where you make that decision.
